.. _random_timeserie_generation:

Random Timeserie Generation
===========================

* There are two pipelines to generate random timeseries implemented. 

* TODO TROUVER NOM POUR DIFFERENCIER REAL DATA ET RANDOM COMPLET

* The first one takes a timeserie as input, and shuffle it

* The second pipeline generates a timeserie using parameters
